note:
At work it seems to be increasingly true that Geoff does stuff, IT is great.

Sometimes I wonder why people follow me and what they expect. You might all be disappointed, but I will continue with a mix of technology, random and cryptic stuff, so bear with me and enjoy!

I think there might also be "other stuff" but that is very vague, but probably covers everything! I avoid politics as best I can, and I love Indian Food.

It is important to be polite and kind, please let me know when I fail.

fields.name: Geoff Does Stuff
fields.value: https://www.geoffdoesstuff.com
